channel.title: Help with JavaC - Please Help Thanks
channel.description:
[b]Okay, So i try to compile this 474 Server i downloaded from lost valentino which was recently released today its called z474.
Heres my code of whats inside the Java Compiler!
@echo off @title Build cd src javac -cp . -d ../bin/ ./com/z474/Engine.java pause exit
'Javac' Is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to Continue . . .
[/b]
[size=18pt][b]HELP IS HIGHLEY APPRICIATED![/b][/size]

item.title: Help with JavaC - Please Help Thanks
item.dc:creator: @Shadowspkin Shadowspkin
item.description:
@Shadowspkin wrote:

Try this but change the java to what ever is ur currect java…

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_19\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

Read full topic
item.source: Help with JavaC - Please Help Thanks

item.title: Help with JavaC - Please Help Thanks
item.dc:creator: @obpkreborn obpkreborn
item.description:
@obpkreborn wrote:

[b]Okay, So i try to compile this 474 Server i downloaded from lost valentino which was recently released today its called z474.

Heres my code of whats inside the Java Compiler!

@echo off
@title Build
cd src
javac -cp . -d …/bin/ ./com/z474/Engine.java
pause
exit

‘Javac’ Is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.
Press any key to Continue . . .

[/b]

[size=18pt]HELP IS HIGHLEY APPRICIATED![/size]
